0.1.name: wordpress/wp-slide-up-box
0.1.description: Add jQuery-driven fancy slideboxes to your WordPress pages and Posts. With this plugin a layer will slide on an inserted picture on mouse hover. You can find detailed documentation about the plugin on the author's homepage: http://arachnoidea.com/wp-slide-up-box/
